summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Twenty-first Avenue South from 120 feet north of Plum Street to Rainier Avenue in the City of Seattle, by constructing a sewer under Ordinance No. 16783, creating Local Improvement District No. 1563 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
